scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.dev:back: NODE_ENV=development cd server && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.dev:front: NODE_ENV=development cd client && npm start && cd ..
scripts.dev:full: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd server && npm run dev && cd .." "cd client && npm start && cd .."
